app.title: AirSwap: Peer-to-peer Token Trading DEX and Open Source Developer DAO

information.counterParty.anyone.paragraph: If you do not specify a counterparty wallet address, any wallet will be able to take your swap. This also means that it's possible the transaction could be front-run by a third-party.
information.counterParty.anyone.title: Anyone
information.counterParty.specify.paragraph: If you specify a counterparty wallet address, only that wallet will be able to take the swap. This protects against front-running and ensures only the intended counterparty can take it.
information.counterParty.specify.title: Specify
information.counterParty.title: Counterparty Wallets
information.gasFreeSwaps.paragraph2: Some swaps do not require you to pay gas because the transaction is handled by the maker. You'll still need to sign the swap using your wallet to proceed.
information.gasFreeSwaps.title: Gasless swaps
information.join.author: Author
information.join.intro: AirSwap is an open community of developers, designers, writers, and tinkerers building decentralized trading systems. Protocol fees are automatically distributed to contributors.
information.join.paragraph2: Check out the following guides to learn more.
information.join.title: Join AirSwap
information.protocolFee.paragraph: Every swap on AirSwap includes a protocol fee transferred to a smart contract controlled by the DAO. These fees are continuously distributed to community contributors who actively participate in the decentralized governance and development of the protocol. By using AirSwap you're supporting AirSwap. Thank you!
information.protocolFee.title: Protocol Fee
